element.name: Median
element.short: Calculate the median of a array of extended values

element.name: MedianQuartiles
element.short: Calculate the median quartiles of a array of float values

element.name: Zscore
element.short: Calculate the z-score for measurements of a taxon

element.name: ModifiedZScore
element.short: Calculate the modified z-score for measurements of a taxon

element.name: IsOutlier
element.short: Return if the value is an outlier based on median quartiles

element.name: IsOutlierZscore
element.short: Return if a value is an outlier based on modified z-score
